name: io.github.khaoss85/orchestro
title: Orchestro - Your AI Development Conductor
description: Transform product ideas into reality with intelligent orchestration. Orchestro bridges Product Managers, Developers, and AI with task decomposition, dependency tracking, pattern learning, and real-time progress visualization. Features 60 MCP tools, AI-powered story decomposition, visual Kanban dashboard, and complete audit trail. Think Trello × Jira × AI - designed specifically for AI-assisted development.
